HIDE!|Her last words|Breaker of Chains}}'''Olly's mother''' is an unnamed minor character in the [[Season 4|fourth season]]. She is played by guest star [[Raewyn Lippert]] and only appears in "[[Breaker of Chains]]".
sections.Biography:
===Background===
She lives with her husband [[Guymon]] and son [[Olly]] in a village close to [[the Wall]].
===[[Season 4]]===
When her husband is killed in a [[Free Folk|wildling]] attack on their village, she orders her son to hide. She is then killed by [[Styr]]. He scares Olly by saying he will eat his dead mother and father.<ref>"[[Breaker of Chains]]"</ref>
